title: Data Science for Business
description:
ABOUT THIS BOOK
Written by renowned data science experts Foster Provost and Tom Fawcett, Data Science for Business introduces the fundamental principles of data science, and walks you through the "data-analytic thinking" necessary for extracting useful knowledge and business value from the data you collect. This guide also helps you understand the many data-mining techniques in use today.

Based on an MBA course Provost has taught at New York University over the past ten years, Data Science for Business provides examples of real-world business problems to illustrate these principles. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also discover how to think data-analytically, and fully appreciate how data science methods can support business decision-making.

-Approach business problems data-analytically, using the data-mining process to -gather good data in the most appropriate way
-Learn general concepts for actually extracting knowledge from data
-Apply data science principles when interviewing data science job candidates
